p: Twenty grams of milled feathers were placed in 1,000 mL plastic bottles and mixed with pre-heated (80°C) stock solutions of NaOH, Na 2SO 3, and de-ionized water adding up to 400 mL according to the experimental plan. The bottles were placed in a water bath heated to 80°C for 60 min. During the treatment, the temperature in the bottles varied between 71 and 75°C. Thereafter, the bottles were chilled in an ice bath to 55 to 58°C to prepare for the enzymatic treatment step.
